headline: Cloudflare named a Leader by Gartner
keywords: WAF, Security, API Security, DDoS, Bot Management, Page Shield, Gartner
description: Gartner has recognised Cloudflare as a Leader in the 2022 "Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Web Application and API Protection (WAAP)" report that evaluated 11 vendors for their ‘ability to execute’ and ‘completeness of vision’
